revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Marvell |model=DB-88F6820-GP |revision=1.5 |is_manuf=No |type=development board |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6828 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=M25P128-VMF6PB |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K512M8RH-107:E |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0, PCIe x4, Mini PCIe, SFP, |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=4 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, CON11 |serial=yes,, |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1512 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Flash-Based, 8-BitCMOS Microcontrollers;Microchip;PIC16F1937;;1;,,, USB to Serial UART Chip;FTDI;FT232R;;1;,,, 16Kbit Two-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;ATMLH444;;1;,,, 16-bit I2C-bus I/O port expander;NXP;PCA9555;;2;,,, 12V, 4.5A 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;2;,,, 1MHz, 7.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG877;;1;,,, Synchronous Switching Regulator Controller;Marvell;88PH8101;;2;,,, 30V, 12.5A Single N-Channel Logic Level MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6680A;;3;,,, 30V, 13A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6679AZ;;2;,,, 30V, 30A N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO6414A;;5;,,, 1.8V, 1.8GHz, Differential Broadband Signal Switch;Pericom;PI2DBS6212ZHE;;3;,,, Two Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;IDT;9DB102BGL;;1;,,, Dual 5-bit Multiplexed 1-bit Latched I2C EEPROM DIP Switch;NXP;PCA9560;;2;,,, |flags=heatsink, fan, SD/SDHC/MMC Card slot, RTC w/ battery, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; }} {{TagLine|Development Board}}
"MARVELL", "DB-88F6820-GP", "SLM-1433-V1" and "PDCB REV 1.0" are silkscreened on the main board.
